This is a website for the unit Exploratory Data Analysis and Visualisation. It contains several practical examples of applying what we have learnt in the unit to real world datasets.

# Data

* Download the Melbourne Housing dataset [here](https://www.kaggle.com/anthonypino/melbourne-housing-market).

<br>

# Download the base language R

* Download the base language of R, which your computer needs before installing other things, [here](https://cran.csiro.au/).

<br>

# Download RStudio

* Download RStudio, the interface to use the language R which we installed above, [here](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download).

<br>
